Module banking.project3
Package banking.project3

Class Date

java.lang.Object
banking.project3.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Creates and represents a date of an event Includes constants day, month, and year Includes isValid and compareTo methods
Author:
Nicholas Yim, Zain Zulfiqar

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date d)
      Compares if dates are before each other, ahead of each other or the same
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      d - the Date to be compared
      Returns:
      int -1 if Date d is less, 1 if greater, and 0 if same

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if date is a valid calendar date Also if leap year, checks if February has the right number of days
      Returns:
      true if date is a valid calendar date, false otherwise
